longBusinessSummary.0: V-Mart Retail Limited operates a chain of value retail departmental stores in India. Its stores offer a range of products, including apparels, footwear, accessories, and general merchandise for men, women, boys, girls, and infants, as well as home furnishings, toys and games, bags, kirana, crockery and utensils, and other products. As of September 30, 2022, the company operated a network of 405 stores. It also offers its products online. V-Mart Retail Limited was incorporated in 2002 and is based in Gurugram, India.
